rows.label: tev024601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lucia about the residential district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lucia about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Lucia for her opinion of xenoforms.

rows.label: tev024601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Lucia if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev024601_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Lucia for her opinion of the Prone.

rows.label: tev024601_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Lucia for her opinion of the Nopon.

rows.label: tev024601_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Lucia about the Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Lucia about recent developments.

rows.label: tev024601_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Lucia for her opinion of the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Lucia about the xenoforms living in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Lucia about recent developments.

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0001
rows.name:
They planned to build apartments in a part of the
district that hasn't been completed yet, but they haven't
made any progress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0002
rows.name:
That's why we still have multiple people sharing each of
these houses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Some people hate having to live with strangers,
but I think it's fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0004
rows.name:
After all, I haven't been able to make a real family
of my own yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0008
rows.name:
I intend to open my home to other like-minded
people who would enjoy living together with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0009
rows.name:
We'll stay up all night talking, we'll bake cookies
for each other... It'll be a blast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0010
rows.name:
The only hard part is finding good people to share my
home with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0013
rows.name:
If you're interested... Too bad! No dudes allowed!
I want it to be a place where we girls can feel
comfortable speaking our minds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0014
rows.name:
I really am sorry about that. If only you had been
a cute girl... But alas![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hey, what about you? You seem really strong,
and you've got a pleasant vibe about you.
I bet it would be a lot of fun having you around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0018
rows.name: ...You already have a home in the BLADE barracks?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0019
rows.name:
Aw, that's too bad. But I suppose that's for the best.
I wouldn't want a BLADE parking her Skell in my
front yard, you know? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Xenoforms living with us in New LA...
Can you even IMAGINE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0026
rows.name:
I bet an influx of xenoforms would really bring this
city to life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0027
rows.name:
You know, I should go recruit some of the xenoform
ladies for my girl's club![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0028
rows.name:
What will I do if the xenoforms don't even have
genders? Hmm... Well, I'll cross that bridge when I
come to it, I guess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0035
rows.name:
There's an older woman named Wendy who lives in
this neighborhood. She's been complaining that my
Ma-non guests are too loud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0036
rows.name:
That Chanty will certainly talk your ear off if you
let her, but her voice isn't what I'd call LOUD.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0037
rows.name:
Okay, so maybe she does squeal a little when she tries
a pizza with toppings that she's never had before...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0038
rows.name:
Still, this whole thing is just silly.
Wendy should come over and join us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0045
rows.name:
Let me introduce the newest member of our girl's club—
this is Prea Slarth of the Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0046
rows.name:
When I saw her dancing under the streetlights at night,
I couldn't help myself—I joined right in![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0047
rows.name:
She said that when she dances in front of men,
they beg her to marry them! And since that's annoying,
she holds one-woman dance parties instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0048
rows.name:
I told her that there were no men at our place,
so she could come over and dance anytime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0049
rows.name:
Now it's only the members of our girl's club that get
to watch New LA's greatest dancer strut her stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0055
rows.name:
Let me introduce you to the newest member of our
girl's club—this is Pulala of the Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0056
rows.name:
She looked so cute standing there in front of Mission
Control waiting for a BLADE to help her, so I struck up
a conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0057
rows.name:
Pulala has the Nopon Commerce Guild bring us the
finest candies and gourmet sweets in all of Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG0058
rows.name:
Am I the only human who's tried all 10 varieties of
mizaria celery? I may well be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1001
rows.name:
I'm part of the tech team. I did join the evacuation,
but they had me analyze the data and prepare a
report when I got back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1002
rows.name:
The enemy leader was this really petite girl!
And that squid xeno that attacked BLADE in
Noctilum was a woman too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1003
rows.name:
Doesn't it seem like there are a lot of tough girls in
the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1004
rows.name:
I wonder if having them come over to talk would be
entirely out of the question? I mean, once they gave
up attacking us and signed a peace treaty, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1009
rows.name:
Maybe it was wrong of me to try to drag Wendy out
of her house like that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1010
rows.name:
You see, when we got the order to evacuate, I tried to
force my neighbor Wendy to come along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1011
rows.name:
But she said she wouldn't go on the Ma-non ship.
She said that she'd rather be killed by xenos like her
son was than be saved by them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1012
rows.name:
When she said that, even Chanty was speechless.
Maybe I should have honored her wishes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1013
rows.name:
I only want Wendy to understand that just because
they're xenoforms doesn't mean they can't be good
people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1020
rows.name:
I'd like to introduce you to the newest member of my
girl's club—this is Gu Ludho of the Wrothians![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1021
rows.name:
I found her lost, confused, and at the brink of keeling
over right there on the street. She'd been trying to get
to the administrative district, but ended up here instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1022
rows.name:
She's really strong. Like a ninja! But also kind of weird.
She thought our pool was a bath, and she freaks out
whenever the alarm on a comm device rings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1023
rows.name:
Isn't that adorable?! I used to think the Wrothians were
so rigid, but she's really changed my mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1028
rows.name:
Before I knew what was happening, I found myself
surrounded by xenoform girls![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1029
rows.name:
Chatty Chanty of the Ma-non, New LA's dancing queen
Prea Slarth, and our Nopon caterer Pulala![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1030
rows.name:
And of course, Gu Ludho, the strong but skittish
Wrothian. Together, we're the best women's social
circle in the entire cosmos![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1031
rows.name:
But the more we talk, the more the name
[ST:playername ] comes up. Is that you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1032
rows.name:
Everyone is really grateful for all you've done.
Thanks so much for giving me the opportunity to enjoy
all my new friends like this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1037
rows.name:
The girl's club took a vote, and we decided to invite
my grumpy neighbor Wendy over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1038
rows.name:
Chanty made a pizza without burning it,
and Pulala hand-picked the finest Miran delicacies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1039
rows.name: Wendy just listened to us talk without saying much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1040
rows.name:
But as she was leaving, she promised to bring her
famous spaghetti and meatballs the next time she came.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024601_MSG1041
rows.name:
She said it was her son's favorite.
I think she's actually starting to cheer up a bit![ST:wait ]
